name: Untitled Horror Project
description:
WIP 2d Horror Game 

Proof of concept 

Early prototype 2d Horror game. Currently gray boxed as I'm working on the assets. 

(Note* There is a bug with the html exporter that causes the picking up the flashlight to crash the game.)

Controls: 

Movement: wasd\ arrow keys  

Examine things\ talk to people:  

Space bar
